name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Lord of the Rings Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into Middle-earth with The Lord of the Rings live wallpaper, bringing the epic fantasy world right to your Chrome new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Lord of the Rings Live Wallpaper transports you to iconic landscapes and characters from the legendary saga, creating an immersive experience each time you open a new tab.

Features:
The Lord of the Rings Live Wallpaper
Google search bar
Addable and removable shortcuts
Date and time display

This Chrome extension enhances your browsing with a breathtaking chrome wallpaper while offering practical tools for a better experience. As one of the top chrome live wallpapers, it transforms your chrome background with the magic and adventure of Middle-earth.

For more live wallpapers, explore Gameograf.com. Check out extensions like: Frodo Baggins Live Wallpaper, Gandalf Live Wallpaper, Aragorn Live Wallpaper, Legolas Live Wallpaper, Sauron Live Wallpaper.
